summary: This is a confidential email from a Deputy United States Marshal in the Southern District of New York regarding prisoner production for July 31, 2019. It includes attachments and appears to be internal administrative communication related to prisoner transport or scheduling.

persons.name: Deputy United States Marshal
persons.context: The sender of the email regarding prisoner production for July 31, 2019, from the United States Marshal Service, Southern District of New York.

events.title: Prisoner Production
events.description: Scheduled prisoner production event referenced in the email subject line.

keyFacts: The document is a confidential email dated July 30, 2019, regarding prisoner production for the following day, July 31, 2019.
It originates from a Deputy United States Marshal in the Southern District of New York.
The email includes attachments with filenames suggesting they may be related to Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) and Metropolitan Detention Center (MDC).
The document is marked as confidential and is part of the SDNY document set related to the Epstein case.
